Posts.Content: Here's an interesting article, where they are trying hormone combo therapy where first they block testosterone in the body, and the cancer shrinks, then they boost testosterone, and give radiation treatments as the cells start growing from the testosterone. http://urology.jhu.edu/newsletter/20...er_2014_55.php I was also on testosterone for over a year. My urologist who handled my kidney stones, and vasectomy also told me I should check my testosterone but never did a psa test. Some countries don't use the psa test at all-
Posts.Title: On testosterone therapy for 1 year prior to finding i had PC

Posts.Content: I'm hoping my ct scan doesn't show cancer in my lymph nodes, so I can start radiation... Here's another interesting article- http://www.renalandurologynews.com/t...ticle/378378/#

Posts.Content: Hi Lance- My psa was first tested last spring. I think it was 4.6, and went back after a short while, and it was around 5.2, 4 more months and it's up over 7. I think the size was 30 grams. Would that be in the ballpark? 6 of 12 cores were cancerous, all on the right side.
Posts.Title: 4+3 for me...

Posts.Content: The doctor was telling me about how minimal side effects are right after the treatments... But now I'm reading about "delayed reactions" of side effects starting months or years later
Posts.Title: 4+3 for me...

Posts.Content: I'm not spamming... And, I don't have a problem sharing details either- I started having painful orgasm while I was getting ebrt, but still able to enjoy sex up to the point of climax. So I ended up learning how to build up the sensation right to the point of the pain starting, and the orgasm sensation kinda dies down, but I am learning how to just stay at the edge, and enjoy multiple orgasms... Not sure how long this will last, but me and the wife are really having fun
Posts.Title: Amazing sex after radiation therapy... Am I the only one???

Posts.Content: The doctor said it "should" get better in time...
Posts.Title: Amazing sex after radiation therapy... Am I the only one???

Posts.Content: I searched the internet, but didn't find much about sex getting BETTER, after prostate cancer treatment...
Posts.Title: Amazing sex after radiation therapy... Am I the only one???

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by creekrat Man I hope some of that activity comes back for me! Thanks for sharing. Think about adding a signiture so others here can compare? Well, I'm somewhat embarrassed to say, I don't know as much about all the details, as most of the other guys on here. Part of my ignorance, is due to the fact that I use VA healthcare, and my records are never easy to get... I'll try a rough draft- age 48 psa 7 4+3 T2c My treatment plan started with gold fiducial marker implants, then 5 weeks of "prophylactic" high dose, double arc external beam radiation that also covered the area around the prostate. I then got 2 weeks of rest, followed by low dose brachytherapy which means 81 radioactive nuggets were implanted in my prostate on March 19 2015. My urologist advised me against having hormone therapy, saying that the added benefit is small, and side effects are many. My oncologist said it was an option I could consider, but also agreed that my treatment plan had a good chance of a cure without the hormone therapy. So, I decided against it-
Posts.Title: Amazing sex after radiation therapy... Am I the only one???

Posts.Content: Originally Posted by HighlanderCFH Sounds like this was external beam treatments followed by inserting the radioactive seeds? Sounds like a pretty good plan of action. Does this complete your primary treatment? Yes sir... In a cruel twist of fate, my next door neighbor (who was an influence on my treatment decision) had his PCa treated with radiation 10 years ago with a low, steady psa ever since... Well, he just told me yesterday his psa shot up to 24 and has to start hormone therapy right away... His doctor told him that his psa test 6 months prior of 4 must have been a mistake... And a fellow legionnaire at my post only got 5 years out of his EBRT, but on the bright side, said he's doing ok on the new hormone shot he's getting. Now I guess it's all about dealing with side effects, and wait to see how long my psa says low.
Posts.Title: The old Johnson has been farting today...

Posts.Content: I had 5 weeks of Radical Radiotherapy-
Posts.Title: The old Johnson has been farting today...

Posts.Content: I finished the second round of my cancer treatments this morning, and had 81 radioactive seeds implanted in my tumor. My first piss at the hospital was quite a treat- Blood, air, and a couple of the radioactive pellets Got to go home with no piss bag
Posts.Title: The old Johnson has been farting today...
